column3: the BEST Bar-B-Que joint in the city.  The ribs are to die for
column4: the brisket is as tender as it gets
column5: and the service is unbeatable.  We drive in all the way from Libertyville (a 45 minute drive) because it's a small price to pay for the privilege of eating the best Bar-B-Que anywhere.  Please let me know if it will be franchised to the northern suburbs!
